items.content_html: ToPDF is a lightweight, user-friendly tool for converting HTML content into downloadable PDF files. Built with React, Vite, and Tailwind CSS, it provides a streamlined experience for transforming web content into shareable, high-quality PDFs.
items.title: dextor-io/topdf.dextor.io: ToPDF is a lightweight, user-friendly tool for converting HTML content into downloadable PDF files. Built with React, Vite, and Tailwind CSS, it provides a streamlined experience for transforming web content into shareable, high-quality PDFs.

items.content_html: A lightweight, production-ready boilerplate for React projects built on Vite. This setup includes essential dependencies for modern web development, such as Axios for API requests, i18n for internationalization, and React Router for route management. Includes Tailwind CSS for styling, ESLint for code quality, and support for environment variables.
items.title: asilvafx/vite-react-boilerplate:  A lightweight, production-ready boilerplate for React projects built on Vite. This setup includes essential dependencies for modern web development, such as Axios for API requests, i18n for internationalization, and React Router for route management. Includes Tailwind CSS for styling, ESLint for code quality, and support for environment variables.

items.content_html: 👀 Easily apply tilt hover effect on React components - lightweight/zero dependencies (3kB)
items.title: mkosir/react-parallax-tilt: 👀  Easily apply tilt hover effect on React components - lightweight/zero dependencies (3kB)

items.content_html: Nitrobase is a blazingly fast, lightweight database built on JSON. It stores data entirely in memory for lightning-quick access, while also providing a JSON file backup for persistence. You can easily serve your data over the web using our high-performance accelerated Nginx server.
items.title: Alwatr/nitrobase: Nitrobase is a blazingly fast, lightweight database built on JSON. It stores data entirely in memory for lightning-quick access, while also providing a JSON file backup for persistence. You can easily serve your data over the web using our high-performance accelerated Nginx server.

items.content_html: Nepali Datepicker React is a lightweight, highly customizable, and feature-rich datepicker component, specifically designed for handling Nepali dates in React.js applications. It offers seamless integration, intuitive user experience, and extensive configuration options.
items.title: tulsiojha/nepali-datepicker-react: Nepali Datepicker React is a lightweight, highly customizable, and feature-rich datepicker component, specifically designed for handling Nepali dates in React.js applications. It offers seamless integration, intuitive user experience, and extensive configuration options.
